ygData.subject: Re: Purity belt... *SPOILER*
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Dorn B dynn in N. Ro used to ignore me (but not the Ogre Thug who was standing next to him once).  My first time in Ro, I ran right up to him, and hailed
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Robert Maze" <rmaze@...>
>
>I was headed toward Kithicor tonite and was running along the dessert wall
>in West Commons and lo and behold I caught up with Gix, taking the path
>along the wall . Never had seen a mob on a wall like that before, but I
>digress. Back to what I was saying when I saw him he conned blue to me at
>19th. He probably has different levels at which he spawns in at. And
>another thing I found odd was that he only viewed me threatingly, not
>scowls. Hmph go figure.
>
>Kurik
>19th Bard - yea I know I level slow, working 50 to 60 hours a week will do
>that to ya. ;)
>Veeshan


Dorn B'dynn in N. Ro used to ignore me (but not the Ogre Thug who
was standing next to him once). My first time in Ro, I ran right up to
him, and hailed him, and he did nothing. I'm assuming this is due to
my diety being Bristlebane, god of thieves.
